message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this excellent product. Given its value, I believe a price of $11,000 feels fair.  What are your thoughts?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I can only pay up to $10,000 for it.
Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but $10,000 is a bit too low for me. Could you meet me halfway at $10,500?
I understand your position, Alice. Considering the product's value, I can increase my offer to $10,200.
